title: Samsung White Rengar is Brown and Clashes with the Uniform
body:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vQ6HmF8pErA/VUB7mOEaO-I/AAAAAAAACuo/4qn_L_nvBSg/s1600/sswrangoturn.jpg

I don't know what else to say about the brown, besides that it looks bad with the blue eyes and blue dreads. I'm guessing you guys had problems with rengar already being white, and the uniform being white. Why not make rengar's fur blue instead of the brown mess that the skin currently is. Idk I am just dissatisfied as a person who plays rengar a lot, and the skin I have been waiting for looks kind of blah IMO.

Also, this looks like sweeper alistar but with worse colors. gg
http://www.wellplayed.fr/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/b2ap3_thumbnail_AlistarSweeper.jpg

Edit: They changed the texture... http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7SCSQc38OuQ/VUGToCLBFmI/AAAAAAAApHA/DETvRk1B-lA/s1600/RENGARCOMPARE.jpg But it still has the same problems I was talking about.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for your feedback! 

We're currently looking at potential texture changes to differentiate SSW Rengar from Sweeper Alistar.
is there any chance he can be entirely redone? Really disappointing skin

instead of being brown can he have like grey or have albino fur with a blue eyepatch and the eyepatch be the team logo and blue tiger strips i just feel like this skin doesn't give justice for how awesome dandy's rengar was in season 4
This, listen to this guy pls. That sounds like a great idea and it wouldn't be too drastic a change
Yeah, at its current state it looks like a more bland sweeper alistar. Perhaps, try a different neutral color like grey instead?

Would rather it be completely redone

His scar is on the wrong eye for pete's sake

I feel like you guys really missed the ball on this one
There is also a minor issue - his scar on the wrong eye.
Please give him black fur, brown and white doesn't look right...
#PutaHoodonIt

Brown is pretty neutral.

I don't understand how you think Brown clashes with White (another neutral) and Blue.  I see people with brown hair wearing white and blue all the time...
This brown looks terrible considering how bright the blue is, what really throws it off for me is the eyes though.
they should have put a hood on him to cover dreadlocks would look a lot better.

I don't find it clashes with the colors and i myself feel like the only one that enjoys how this skins looks but changing him blue would practically make him night hunter with a different suit. The hood being added would probably make this skin so much better

If there is a hood added then they might as well take off the dreads IMO, just like Night Hunter. Or follow this concept which is much better

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/310/9/8/_lol__samsung_white_twitch_thresh____rengar_by_n1ps-d846f8s.png This hood has enough room in it for his dreads. Then there is this one too http://41.media.tumblr.com/54f1d07e96bed799b4f71bbe2926a802/tumblr_ndxio4A5LR1qeuvw3o1_1280.png
I'd main Rengar for the rest of my life if he'd look like that, id even pay 3250rp i don't care and i don't even main rengar yet.
I like that second design more than the the first one just because I don't want another blue (AVATAR CONFIRMED!?) Rengar and that it looks soooooo much cooler with a gray color.
Same Rengar player here, dont wanna see rengar's scar on the wrong eye {{champion:107}}

Holy shit, you're right there is a small scar on his right eye. It's supposed to be his left eye. I Just hated the coloration of his eyes considering his fur color, but that makes me cringe even further.
why does he gotta be brown why not a white or a  grey

> [{quoted}](name=skyfall619,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qgRs0mrr,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-04-29T21:20:50.728+0000)
>
> why does he gotta be brown why not a white or a  grey

Because that's too similar to his classic skin. It would literally be Rengar in a track suit. Not fun or intuitive.
still better then brown
And every American knows white can't mix with brown, right OP?
Only if you're a TexMex. Kappa.
not very assassin looking
I actually really like Brown and Blue :C
Racist.

I don't have any issues with the brown because of the great texturework and shading on it. A nice bright brown to go with the white and blue outfit. They did a great job making them all fit together.

But with that said, something *really* needs to be done about the skin's likeness to Alistar's skin.
looks like trash

This skin just looks really boring and plain, he is just like, wearing some clothes. It just doesn't have the cool factor or the deadly factor (which Rengar kinda needs). Also his face looks weird, like he is smelling something bad.
+1, this pinpoints the issue I have with the skin. Concept looks cool, final product not so much IMO.
Theres other solucion its make a new rengar skin its ezear
Damn bruh where have you been, resurrecting this year old thread lol. And yes, this skin was a failure imo, and we seriously need another rengo skin considering how old of a champ he is.

The first time I saw the skin, I instantly thought it was a Sweeper Alistar twin, which is bad. Even the shape of SSW Rengar's head is similar to Ali. 

I made a quick alteration today, it's incomplete and I don't want to finish it v_v

http://i.imgur.com/sKj3LB2.png

I would have:

- Removed the shirt and expanded a little on the armor
- Recolored the pants to white/light blue with the logo on it
- Removed the shoes
- Redone the claws and dagger
Gonna be honest, I freaking hate the shoes on him. There is just something about them, idk if it is how big the shoes are or what. He needs those claws to breathe though.
Just another terrible Rengar skin. Night Hunter was lame but this laughable.
is that samsung white alistar? hue

This skin looks ugly af.

Reminds me of how ugly Debonair Galio still is after continued negative feedback.
Black fur? With some type of hat on him?
Ooh, blue rengar would be neat! I mean I know we have night stalker, but I think it'd go well with the white uniform.

I think if we went with a different hairstyle look aside from (or removing) the dreads he'd have a very definitive look to him that would make him stand out very much in this skin. I know it would have to be bumped up to 975 RP, but if it will make Rengar look more defined and help ehance the skin, I would pay for it.
make him purple
Racist.
